column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Teplodar
#Text=Teplodar
#Text=( Ukrainian : Теплодар ) is a town in Southern Ukraine , near Odessa .
#Text=It was planned as the support town of a double reactor nuclear heat and power plant .
#Text=Plans to build the plant were abandoned after the Chernobyl accident in 1986 .
#Text=Teplodar is a rarity as , contrary to normal Soviet practice , the town was built in 1979 to 1986 before the nuclear plant had been constructed .
#Text=Understand
#Text=Teplodar is Russian speaking but you will find a few that speak Moldovan , Ukrainian and very few that speak English .
#Text=There is a school , medical centre and a number of small shops .
#Text=Most workers commute to Odessa or to the 7km Market .
#Text=The city is quite poor by Ukrainian standards and typically not much money is put into infrastructure .
#Text=Medical facilities are very poor .
#Text=Get in
#Text=There are really only two ways to get to Teplodar .
#Text=By small bus ( marshrutka ) or car .
#Text=Teplodar marshrutka ( number 75 ) leaves the Privos market area close to the main rail station in Odessa and arrives outside the only supermarket in Teplodar ( Silpo ) .
#Text=A typical marshrutka hold around 14-16 persons and leave Odessa when filled .
#Text=Hours of operation are about 06:00 until about 20:30 .
#Text=The journey takes about 30-40 minutes .
#Text=Driving from Odessa you go to the check point on the outer limits of the city and you have the choice of the M15 or M16 roads .
#Text=Teplodar is about 40 km by road from Odessa center .
#Text=Get around
#Text=You either walk or use the car you arrived in .
#Text=Walking is almost the universal method to navigate Teplodar .
#Text=Everything in Teplodar is no more than a 10-minute walk from your point of departure .
#Text=See
#Text=No attractions of note .
#Text=Most people that come to this city are visiting friends or a local business .
#Text=Teplodar has one church ( Orthodox ) and a motocross facility .
#Text=The city is approx one kilometer square .
#Text=Lots of footpaths to keep an avid fitness freak happy .
#Text=Like most places in Ukraine some sections of footpaths are not for the faint hearted and you must be careful at night only because of the condition of the footpaths .
#Text=Maintenance and good quality are not words that resonate deeply within the Ukrainian psyche .
#Text=However it is very safe in terms of low ( or near to zero ) crime rate .
#Text=Do
#Text=Nothing of note unless you are a motocross fanatic .
#Text=The motocross facility operates during summer only for organised events .
#Text=Buy
#Text=No souvenirs but you can buy essentials like flowers , chocolates , spirits/beer , small gifts , etc.
#Text=You really need to travel to Odessa and visit shopping areas , bazaars or the world famous 7km Market on the outskirts of Odessa to find what travellers like to buy .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Not much to choose from : most people cook their own .
#Text=There is only one supermarket called Silpo ( part of a national food chain ) .
#Text=Silpo has a reasonable selection of foods .
#Text=If you like bazaar type food then the local bazaar operates every day of the year .
#Text=There are some good clean shops that sell excellent Ukrainian food essentials .
#Text=Metro Restaurant
#Text=, Generala Plieva Street ( behind the police station ) .
#Text=Open 7 days including all holidays from noon to midnight ( sometimes later ) .

#Text=Ukrainian ( and western ) cuisine , good service , modern clean throughout , excellent clean toilets , underground but very spacious , good music system plus TV in every room , dance floor , excellent wine selection .
#Text=Drink
#Text=More than a few bars are available if you prefer to mix with the locals .
#Text=Only one bar that would qualify as being up to a good standard .
#Text=Disco in the community centre on Friday and Saturday nights .
#Text=Dress code anywhere in Teplodar is neat casual .
#Text=No safety concerns as the crime rate is near zero , all venues are solo-woman friendly .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=There are no accommodation facilities in Teplodar other than private .
#Text=Go next
#Text=The only way out is the same way you arrived by car or bus .
#Text=See " #Get in " section above .
